result.ga: An bhfuil mé chomh dona sin

result.eng: Anybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.
result.ga: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht
result.orig: Ba cheart go mbeadh Gaeilge mhaith ag an té a chaith an oiread sin ama sa Ghaeltacht

result.ponchtml: Ba ċeart go mbeaḋ Gaeilge ṁaiṫ ag an té a ċaiṫ an oiread sin ama sa ĠaeltaċtAnybody who spent so much time in the Gaeltacht should speak good Irish.

result.eng: I was ill, so I could not go to school.
result.ga: Bhí mé tinn mar sin níorbh fhéidir liom dul ar scoil

result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé tinn mar sin níorḃ ḟéidir liom dul ar scoilI was ill, so I could not go to school.

result.eng: Composers, musicians, dancers and so on.

result.eng: Why did you stay so long?
result.ga: Cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sin
result.orig: Cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sin
result.html: Cén fáth ar fhan tú chomh fada sinWhy did you stay so long?
result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫ ar ḟan tú ċoṁ fada sinWhy did you stay so long?

result.eng: The Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ga: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.orig: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na Polainne
result.html: Is iad na Polannaigh an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin amhlaidh toisc a mhéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.
result.ponchtml: Is iad na Polannaiġ an dream is mó inimirce go hÉirinn Tá sé sin aṁlaiḋ toisc a ṁéad atá daonra na PolainneThe Polish are the most numerous immigant group to Ireland. This is so because of the high population of Poland.

result.html: Ní dóigh liom éI don't think so.
result.ponchtml: Ní dóiġ liom éI don't think so.

result.eng: I have a shower, I put my clothes on, I brush my teeth, and so on.

result.eng: You were so alike when you were little!

result.eng: Hold them tight so they don't get away.

result.eng: He had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ga: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.orig: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iad
result.html: Bhí sé de mhisneach aige t-léinte a chaitheamh a bhí chomh teann sin go mbeadh eagla ort go bpollfadh a dhidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé de ṁisneaċ aige t-léinte a ċaiṫeaṁ a ḃí ċoṁ teann sin go mbeaḋ eagla ort go bpollfaḋ a ḋidíní iadHe had the courage to wear t-shirts that were so tight you'd worry his nipples would pierce them.

result.eng: The pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.
result.ga: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann
result.orig: Bhí an pota chomh mór sin go bhféadfá brachán do theach lán bochtán a dhéanamh ann

result.ponchtml: Ḃí an pota ċoṁ mór sin go ḃféadfá braċán do ṫeaċ lán boċtán a ḋéanaṁ annThe pot was so large you could make porridge for a house full of poor people in it.

result.eng: You have the children all confused, if I must say so.

result.eng: He was so short of sense as a child five years younger than him.
result.ga: Bhí sé chomh gann i gcéill leis an leanbh a bhí cúig bliana ní b'óige ná é
